ValidationRule.description: Ensure that Year is filled in for Financial Docs
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.No_Validation__c = False, ISNULL( NDOC__Created_By_Closing_Checklist_Id__c ), ISBLANK(NDOC__Year__c), OR( Name = 'TAX RETURNS', Name = 'FINANCIAL STATEMENTS', Name = 'W-2', Name = 'TAX TRANSCRIPT', Name = 'TAX RETURN EXTENSION', Name = 'PAYSTUB' ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify the Year of this document.
